org.point85.workschedule

Class Break

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.point85.workschedule.Break

  • public class Break
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Break is a defined working period of time during a shift, for example lunch.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Break(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.time.LocalTime start, java.time.Duration duration)
      Construct a period of time for a break
